description:
New analysis reveals that Britain needs 1,000 km of new power lines and pylons – and 4,500 km of undersea cables – to meet its legally binding 2030 Net Zero target.

The post 1,000 km of Pylons Needed to Hit Net Zero Targets appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: 1,000 km of Pylons Needed to Hit Net Zero Targets

description:
In a historic move, a U.S. public health authority has voted to ban COVID-19 vaccines, claiming that the risks now outweigh the benefits

The post Covid Vaccine Banned for First Time in Idaho Counties appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Covid Vaccine Banned for First Time in Idaho Counties

description:
With Kemi Badenoch now at the helm, the Conservatives must fearlessly launch a Restoration to undo New Labour's radical changes and restore parliamentary sovereignty, says David Starkey.

The post How Kemi Badenoch’s Tories Can Rebuild Britain appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: How Kemi Badenoch’s Tories Can Rebuild Britain

description:
The harrowing testimonies from the Scottish Covid Inquiry reveal how mask mandates dehumanised residents and shattered communication in health and social care, says Dr Gary Sidley.

The post The Curse of Masks in Health and Social Care: Testimony From the Scottish Covid Inquiry appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Curse of Masks in Health and Social Care: Testimony From the Scottish Covid Inquiry

description:
A new audit of baby deaths at Lucy Letby's hospital shows many occurred when she was off duty, bolstering her defense's claim that systemic failures, not her actions, may be to blame.

The post Lucy Letby Was Not on Duty When Many Babies Went Downhill Fastest, New Audit Finds appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Lucy Letby Was Not on Duty When Many Babies Went Downhill Fastest, New Audit Finds

description:
The higher education watchdog has been urged to investigate a "political" campaign to oust Buckingham University’s Vice-Chancellor for being too "Right-wing".

The post Buckingham University Reported to Watchdog After Vice-Chancellor “Pushed Out for Holding Right-Wing views” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Buckingham University Reported to Watchdog After Vice-Chancellor “Pushed Out for Holding Right-Wing views”

description:
Welcome to Sadiq Khan's London, says Steven Tucker: where images of women in swimwear, wedding cake and hotdogs are banned but radical Islamic preachers burning dollars are welcome.

The post Welcome to Sadiq Khan’s London: Where Images of Wedding Cake and Hotdogs Are Banned But Radical Islamic Preachers Burning Dollars Are Welcome appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Welcome to Sadiq Khan’s London: Where Images of Wedding Cake and Hotdogs Are Banned But Radical Islamic Preachers Burning Dollars Are Welcome

description:

title: News Round-Up
